s: To make a Gift List on Amazon, go to Your Registries and Gift Lists. You can add items to your Gift List at any time. You can also create Gift Tags.

t: Amazon Gift Cards | Best Offers | Instant Delivery on GyFTR
s: Choose Amazon from the list of brands that appear on your screen. From the list of previous transactions related to Amazon vouchers, choose the one that you require. In a few minutes, you will get the Amazon gift card code on your SMS and email inbox.

t: Do Amazon gifts show the sender? - Quora
s: Answer: I sometimes receive gift items via Amazon without knowing who sent them to me. If you want to let your recipient know that you were the sender you should designate the order as a gift and include your name in the gift note. Even then the gift notification is so small and flimsy that it ma...

t: Amazon Prime members can now send gifts with just a phone number or email address | The Verge
s: October 4, 2021 - Amazon is launching a new feature that allows subscribers to its Prime service to send gifts even if they don’t know the recipient’s address. It seems like a feature that spammers could easily use for harassment.

t: Amazon.com: Customer Questions & Answers
s: If it says "Gift options not available" after you add item to cart, then the person that receives your gift WILL NOT KNOW WHO SENT IT. I like using Amazon, but this is a major problem that Amazon refuses to address.

t: Send a Gift Receipt - Amazon Customer Service
s: You can send a gift receipt to a gift recipient to allow them to return items.

t: Corporate Gift Card Email Delivery Service - Amazon Customer Service
s: Corporate customers with an Amazon.com Gift Card purchase agreement can use the email delivery service to send multiple gift cards at once.

t: Order Gift Cards - Amazon Customer Service
s: You can order email, text message, Print at Home, Anytime, Reload, or mail gift cards on Amazon.com.

t: Gift Cards - Amazon Customer Service
s: Here you can find pages that help you order and redeem an Amazon.com gift card. You will also find links to information about your gift card balance, gift card issues, and restrictions.

t: Find a List - Amazon Customer Service
s: If you want to see a friend's Amazon list, you must message them to ask them to share it.
